languages.text: "Мы — не монстры, что бы он о нас ни думал. Сдайте его на ближайшей колонии для пожизненной отправки на мир-тюрьму".
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
languages.original_text: "Мы — не монстры, что бы он о нас ни думал. Сдайте его на ближайшей колонии для пожизненной отправки на мир-тюрьму".

traits.locale_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
"We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

languages.text: «No somos monstruos, por más que él piense lo contrario. Llévenselo a la colonia más cercana para que cumpla cadena perpetua en el mundo penal».
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

traits.locale_text: «No somos monstruos, por más que él piense lo contrario. Llévenselo a la colonia más cercana para que cumpla cadena perpetua en el mundo penal».

languages.text: 「その男がどう思おうと、{mf|俺|私}達は怪物ではない。近くの流刑惑星のコロニーに引き渡して、そこで生涯を終えてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

traits.locale_text: 「その男がどう思おうと、{mf|俺|私}達は怪物ではない。近くの流刑惑星のコロニーに引き渡して、そこで生涯を終えてもらおう」

languages.text: “无论他怎么看待我们，我们都不是怪物。把他送到最近的殖民地，让他去刑罚世界接受无期徒刑。”
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

traits.locale_text: “无论他怎么看待我们，我们都不是怪物。把他送到最近的殖民地，让他去刑罚世界接受无期徒刑。”

languages.text: "Wir sind keine Monster, egal, was er von uns denkt. Setzt ihn auf der nächstgelegenen Kolonie ab. Er soll den Rest seines Lebens in einer Strafwelt verbringen."
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind keine Monster, egal, was er von uns denkt. Setzt ihn auf der nächstgelegenen Kolonie ab. Er soll den Rest seines Lebens in einer Strafwelt verbringen."

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il pense de nous, nous ne sommes pas des monstres. Livrez-le aux autorités de la colonie la plus proche, qu'il purge une peine à perpétuité sur un monde pénal. »
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il pense de nous, nous ne sommes pas des monstres. Livrez-le aux autorités de la colonie la plus proche, qu'il purge une peine à perpétuité sur un monde pénal. »

languages.text: "Hakkımızda ne düşünürse düşünsün biz canavar değiliz. Bir ceza dünyasında müebbet hapis yatması için onu en yakındaki koloniye bırakın."
languages.original_text: "We are not monsters, no matter what he thinks of us. Turn him in on the nearest colony for a life sentence on a penal world."
